scripts.migrate-db: npm run build && NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=dist node dist/migrations/index.js
scripts.build-deposit-api: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/tsoa.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-deposit-api && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.build-image-deposit-api: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-api:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-api:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-third-party-coin-deposit-pro: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-third-party-coin-deposit-processor:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-third-party-coin-deposit-processor:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/third-party-coin-deposit-processor/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-latest: npm run build-image-deposit-api && npm run build-image-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor && npm run build-image-third-party-coin-deposit-processor
scripts.push-image: npm run && npm run push-third-party-coin-deposit-processor-image && npm run push-deposit-api-image && npm run push-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor-image
